com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing

Class PImmutableDimension

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Dimension2D
      • com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing.PImmutableDimension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    @FullyTested
public final class PImmutableDimension
extends Dimension2D
    Immutable version of Dimension. There are no public constructors. Instead, use the factory methods:
    • getSharedFromDefaultWidthAndHeight()
    • getSharedFromWidthAndHeight(int, int)
    • createFromWidthAndHeight(int, int)
    • copyOfDimension(Dimension)

    All instances of this class are fully immutable, thus thread-safe, and safe to store as static final constants.

    Author:
    Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Dimension, Dimension2D

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        Creates a description from width and height, e.g., "32x32"

      • getSharedFromDefaultWidthAndHeight

        public static PImmutableDimension getSharedFromDefaultWidthAndHeight()
        Calls getSharedFromWidthAndHeight(int, int) with DEFAULT_WIDTH and DEFAULT_HEIGHT.

      • getSharedFromWidthAndHeight

        public static PImmutableDimension getSharedFromWidthAndHeight(int width,
                                              int height)
        Like Dimension, the inputs are unchecked. This method uses caching. To avoid the cache, see createFromWidthAndHeight(int, int).
        Parameters:
        width - any integer value -- unchecked
        height - any integer value -- unchecked
        Returns:
        shared ref that matches width and height
        See Also:
        createFromWidthAndHeight(int, int), copyOfDimension(Dimension)

      • createFromWidthAndHeight

        public static PImmutableDimension createFromWidthAndHeight(int width,
                                           int height)
        Creates a new instance from inputs. This method does not use caching. To use the cache, see getSharedFromWidthAndHeight(int, int).
        Parameters:
        width - any integer value -- unchecked
        height - any integer value -- unchecked
        Returns:
        new instance
        See Also:
        getSharedFromWidthAndHeight(int, int), copyOfDimension(Dimension)

      • copyOfDimension

        public static PImmutableDimension copyOfDimension(Dimension dim)
        Creates a new PImmutableDimension from another Dimension.

        This is a convenience method to call createFromWidthAndHeight(int, int) with dim.width and dim.height.

        Parameters:
        dim - another Dimension to copy. Must not be null
        Returns:
        dimension ref that matches width and height
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if dim is null
        See Also:
        getSharedFromWidthAndHeight(int, int), createFromWidthAndHeight(int, int)
